ac: 22, touch 11, flat-footed 21 (+6 armor, +1 Dex, +3 natural, +2 shield)
other_gear: +1 black dragonhide scale mail, mwk heavy wooden shield, +1 terbutje, mwk javelins (2), 282 gp
feats: Improved Initiative, Lightning Reflexes, Power Attack, Toughness, Vital Strike, Weapon Focus (terbutje), Weapon Specialization (terbutje)

sections.body: During Combat The boggard champion uses her terrifying croak before engaging in melee.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: Most boggard champions forsake tactics in favor of mayhem. In magic-deficient tribes, champions are often second only to priest-kings in status.

special_qualities: armor training 1, hold breath, swamp stride
name: Boggard Champion
skills: Acrobatics +2 (+18 when jumping), Climb +6, Intimidate +6, Perception +5, Stealth +0 (+8 in swamps), Survival +8, Swim +10
combat_gear: potion of bull's strength, potion of cure serious wounds
